DESCRIPTION: Reset the XP for a member, role, or the entire server.
EXTENDED_LINE_3: **{{prefix}}xpreset @role** ~ Reset the XP for all members that have this role.
EXTENDED_LINE_4: **This is a very powerful and dangerous command. Please use wisely. Once XP is reset, it can not be restored.**
ALIASES: XPReset does not have any aliases.
MEMBER: The XP has been reset for {{member}}.
PATIENCE: Please hold on, this can take a while... I will let you know once it is complete.
ROLE: The XP has been reset for all members that have the {{role}} role.
ALL: The XP has been reset for every member on the server.
